name: The Holy Gospels with Sacred Art
tagline: Catholic English and Latin translations with sacred art
body:
The Holy Gospel According to St. John with Sacred Art is available in hardcover, softcover, English, and Latin.

Hardcover English-Latin edition (recommended) is available here.
Softcover English is available here and here.
Softcover Latin is available here and here.
Softcover English-Latin edition is available here.

Free .pdfs are available here in English and Latin. The entire work is in the public domain, so please share.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
